sentences.en: And nothing was so irritating as the confident way he used archaic idiom.
sentences.cn: 没什么比他使用过时的方言时那种自负的神态更气人的了。

sentences.en: Calcium cyanamide is poisonous and irritating to the skin.
sentences.cn: 氰氨化钙是毒性物质,对皮肤有刺激性.

sentences.en: Consequently he threw Carrie into repression, which was irritating.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉的心里话得不到倾吐,感到受了压抑, 心里很不痛快.

sentences.en: Faber found his boastfulness irritating. " How many enemy aircraft did you shoot down? "
sentences.cn: 费伯被他的吹嘘激怒了. “ 你打下几架敌机 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: He was smiling in a way I found very irritating.
He’s the most irritating man I’ve ever met.
sentences.cn: 他是我遇到过的最烦人的人。

sentences.en: His ceaseless straining after brilliant epigrams quickly becomes irritating.
sentences.cn: 他不断追求漂亮警句的手法则很容易使人厌倦.

sentences.en: I shall select from the more polite and less irritating speeches.
sentences.cn: 我会挑选一些比较客气的,不那么刺人的句子.

sentences.en: In heavy concentrations, ozone is irritating to the eyes, nose and throat.
sentences.cn: 高浓度的臭氧会对眼睛、鼻子和咽喉有刺激作用。

sentences.en: It turns out to be a far more irritating poem than its oft-quoted lines suggest.
sentences.cn: 结果发现这首诗比起它常被引用的那几句来更加恼人。

sentences.en: Its doubting and challenging, its quibbling and dialectics, often are irritating to common people.
sentences.cn: 它的疑惑和诘难, 它的诡辨和辩证, 常常是令人讨厌的.

sentences.en: Oh, that irritating cough! How it gets on one's nerves.
sentences.cn: 哦! 那种刺耳的咳嗽声,多么使人心烦!

sentences.en: She found his preoccupation with money irritating.
sentences.cn: 她对他一心只想着钱感到很厌烦。

sentences.en: She found his preoccupation with money irritating.
sentences.cn: 她发觉他心里只有钱,感到很生气.

sentences.en: She has a rather twee manner that I find irritating.
sentences.cn: 她娇里娇气,我觉得很讨厌.

sentences.en: The man's worse than irritating, he's a positive menace!
sentences.cn: 这个人不只惹人生气, 简直是讨厌透了.

sentences.en: Use a humidifier in heated rooms to prevent dry air irritating your throat.
sentences.cn: 在开暖气的房间里可用加湿器，防止吸入干燥空气造成喉咙不适。

words.tran_cn: 刺激的；刺激性的；使发怒的
[医] 刺激物，[医] 刺激剂
激怒；使…无效；使…兴奋（irritate的过去分词）
刺激的；气人的；使愤怒的

trans.tran_cn: 气人的，使人不愉快的，<医>起刺激作用的
trans.tran_en: an irritating habit, situation etc keeps annoying you

trans.tran_cn: 使恼怒，使急躁，使感到不适，使疼痛
